actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the operation of certain broadcasting stations.

summary.text: Provides that stations engaged in television broadcasting (other than those engaged solely in the function of rebroadcasting the signals of television broadcast stations), and stations engaged in radio broadcasting of frequencies below 1610 kilocycles with transmitter power in excess of 10 kilowatts shall be exempt from the operator's license requirements of the Communications Act of 1934. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 318)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the operation of certain broadcasting stations.
